tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE zone_information (
   zone_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   zone_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   soil_id INT REFERENCES soil_information(soil_id),
   slope DECIMAL,
   sun_exposure VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_information (
    soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    soil_moisture_level INT,
    soil_ph_level DECIMAL(4,2)
)

CREATE TABLE slope_information (
    slope_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    slope_degree DECIMAL(4,2),
    slope_aspect VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sun_exposure (
    exposure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sun_intensity INT,
    sun_direction VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_zones (
    zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_name VARCHAR(50),
    soil_id INT,
    slope_id INT,
    exposure_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (soil_id) REFERENCES soil_information(soil_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (slope_id) REFERENCES slope_information(slope_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (exposure_id) REFERENCES sun_exposure(exposure_id)
)
CREATE TABLE SoilType (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Slope (id INT PRIMARY KEY, slope_angle FLOAT, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE SunExposure (id INT PRIMARY KEY, exposure_type VARCHAR(255), description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Zone (id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_name VARCHAR(255), soil_type_id INT, slope_id INT, sun_exposure_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (soil_type_id) REFERENCES SoilType(id), FOREIGN KEY (slope_id) REFERENCES Slope(id), FOREIGN KEY (sun_exposure_id) REFERENCES SunExposure(id));
CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_id INT, start_time TIME, end_time TIME, FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES Zone(id));
